pages.text: A $(item)backpack$() allows you to store extra items on your person, up to 18 stacks, in fact!$(2br)Once crafted, it can be placed down in the world and equipped by $(thing)sneaking and holding left-click$() until it is picked up. It will then be placed in your $(thing)chestplate slot$().$(2br)To unequip the $(item)backpack$(), $(thing)shift right-click$() on the ground to place it back down.

pages.title: Backpack
pages.text: The $(item)backpack$() can be accessed while equipped by pressing $(thing)$(k:key.wearablebackpacks.open)$(), or by $(thing)right-clicking$() it when placed in the world.$(2br)$(l)Note:$() if a backpack is broken without $(thing)sneaking$(), all its contents will be dropped.
